title: Synthetics. Volume 4
brief_description: Volume 4 of a 4 volume CD-ROM collection of material compiled by Stephen Jones for the exhibition formally known as Synthetics. Content is arranged in folders and as a collection of texts, images and hypertexts. The main folder contains material relating to the work of Stephen Jones. (see: Documentation for details)
